---
format:
  html:
    quality: 1
  pdf:
    quality: 2
  typst:
    quality: 0
  dashboard:
    quality: -1
  docx:
    quality: 1
  pptx:
    quality: -1
keep-typ: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    latex:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        -
          - '\\hfill\\includegraphics\{100.png\}'
        - []
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        -
          - "#align\\(right\\)\\[(\r\n?|\n)#box"
        -
          - "#block\\[(\r\n?|\n)#align\\(right\\)\\["
---
